snippet.title: Beach Buggy Blitz™ Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Drive your hot-rod beach buggy as far as you can into the uncharted depths of a mysterious tropical island in this action-packed game for phones and tablets.  Swerve and smash through a gorgeously detailed and completely destructible world packed with Tiki statues, grass shacks, giant crabs and lava monsters. Explore sun-swept beaches, secret caves, fog-shrouded swamps, ruined temples and erupting volcanoes in this action-packed quest of discovery and mayhem!

Build a performance-boosting collection of upgrades and powerups! Unlock new vehicles like the Lightning muscle car and Rock Stomper monster truck. Upgrade your cars and customize their paint jobs. Collect wacky new characters. Unlock and upgrade amazing powerups like the fire-spitting Boost, the coin-tastic Coin Bubble, and a Shield that turns you into a unstoppable smash-everything force of destruction!

From Vector Unit, makers of Riptide GP and Shine Runner:  Beach Buggy Blitz!  

Available for iPhone, iPad and Android phones and tablets.  

(Android Tegra 3 images shown in video.)
